actions.name: CreatePipeline
actions.description: Grants permission to create an OpenSearch Ingestion pipeline

actions.name: DeletePipeline
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an OpenSearch Ingestion pipeline

actions.name: GetPipeline
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve configuration information for an OpenSearch Ingestion pipeline

actions.name: GetPipelineBlueprint
actions.description: Grants permission to get the contents of an OpenSearch Ingestion pipeline blueprint

actions.name: GetPipelineChangeProgress
actions.description: Grants permission to get granular information about the status of an OpenSearch Ingestion pipeline

actions.name: Ingest
actions.description: Grants permission to ingest data through an OpenSearch Ingestion pipeline

actions.name: ListPipelineBlueprints
actions.description: Grants permission to list the names of available blueprints for an OpenSearch Ingestion pipeline configuration

actions.name: ListPipelines
actions.description: Grants permission to list basic configuration for each OpenSearch Ingestion pipeline in the current account and Region

actions.name: ListTagsForResource
actions.description: Grants permission to list all resource tags associated with an OpenSearch Ingestion pipeline

actions.name: StartPipeline
actions.description: Grants permission to start an OpenSearch Ingestion pipeline

actions.name: StopPipeline
actions.description: Grants permission to stop an OpenSearch Ingestion pipeline

actions.name: TagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to attach resource tags to an OpenSearch Ingestion pipeline

actions.name: UntagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to remove resource tags from an OpenSearch Ingestion Service pipeline

actions.name: UpdatePipeline
actions.description: Grants permission to modify the configuration of an OpenSearch Ingestion pipeline

actions.name: ValidatePipeline
actions.description: Grants permission to validate the configuration of an OpenSearch Ingestion pipeline
